texto: process attributes, which are in turn grouped into a series of capability levels. Each capability level represents an incremental evolution in the management and control of the processes, so that the assessment models provide a road map for increasing capability. The capability dimension defines a scale of five levels of capability characterised by a set of nine process attributes.
